lines.text: Are you cheating Ralph?
No, Marian. You cheat. Remember?

[when their child walks into the bedroom]
Silly daddy, sleeping on mommy
Why don't you go get drunk and pee all over...
I'm gonna get drunk! I'm gonna get drunk right now! Ah damnit!
You know, I don't know who you think would wanna look at your sad,middle aged ass anymore!
Don't talk to me like that and don't you come back here! I'm not taking you back no more understand? No more I'm not taking you back!
I'm not COMING back!
Slobbering over Honey like that it was so embarrassing...
I never touched Honey!
I didn't say you touched her I said you slobbered on her!
Oops, excuse me, sweetie. I really like the Wymans, don't you?
Who?
The doctor and his wife, Marian. Ralph, I think his name. You know, the ones from the concert.
He seems kind of lofty. You're off to work early, huh?
Yeah, I got two Birthdays today. He's a doctor, remember? And she is artist, I think.
Oh yeah? What kind?
What kind? She's a painter. She paints pictures, you know? They really want us to come to dinner.
Well, We'll see. I'm off.
What does that mean? We already agreed to go. We made a date. Bye. Close the door, Stuart.
Sorry!
Wouldn't it be a trip if Alex Trebek bought a nude painting of me?
Hey Jer, how goes the war?
Bad guys are winning, sir.
I hate L.A. All they do is snort coke and talk.
Don't you want me to lick your balls for you?
That was a 35 dollar belt!

[talking through sex hotline]
Oh! I can feel your balls up against my ass!
Look at these fish, though. Aren't those cool?
Yeah, you know I don't really give a fuck about fish. They just kinda swim, eat and shit.

[Stuart has just returned from his fishing trip]
Your hands stink.

[Sniffs his fingers]
Kinda smells like pussy, don't you think?

[laughs, smacks him on the shoulder]
I *hate* that. Go wash your hands.
Smells like a rainbow to me!
Ah, Christ! That's my half supply.
